entry.title: Combined summary - Request for Comments: Mastering Bitcoin 2nd Edition
entry.summary: Andreas Antonopoulos, the author of "Mastering Bitcoin," is seeking feedback and corrections for the second edition of his book. He believes this request is relevant as the book is often the first source of information for many new bitcoin developers. The new edition is set to cover several new topics, including segwit, bip9 signalling, timelocks, payment channels, and lightning network. Most chapters have undergone significant changes, clarifications, and corrections. The book is open source and can be found on GitHub. Antonopoulos welcomes pull requests, issues, and comments, but there are only 2-3 weeks left before it goes into a production freeze. The book will be published within the next 6-8 weeks.
